snippet: Facebook plans to announce a substantial redesign of its News Feed — a makeover aimed both at keeping users glued to the social network and luring more advertising dollars.
abstract: Facebook plans to announce substantial redesign of its News Feed, makeover aimed both at keeping users glued to site and luring more advertising dollars; company executives say they want to make the News Feed, first page every user sees upon logging in, more relevant.
lead_paragraph: Facebook plans to announce a substantial redesign of its News Feed — a makeover aimed both at keeping users glued to the social network and luring more advertising dollars.

headline.seo: Facebook’s Redesign Hopes to Keep Users Engaged
headline.main: Face-Lift at Facebook, to Keep Its Users Engaged
headline.print_headline: Face-Lift at Facebook, to Keep Its Users Engaged
